Reviews.Title: R.S. Buck regarding Zmodo 8CH H.264 DVR CCTV Surveillance Camera System 4 Sony CCD Night Vision Outdoor Camera With 1TB HDD
Reviews.Author: R.S. Buck
Reviews.Content: After Careful Consideration and a lot of research into Home Security A/V Systems... This was by far the best deal for the Money. Not only do you get the DVR with a 1TB HDD Installed, but you get 4 Zmodo Cameras sporting the Sony CCD Image Sensor. Great Cameras with a great DVR System, and at a Great Price. Shipping was fast! This system comes with the DVR, Remote Control, Mouse, Software, Mounts, and all the Power Cables you'll need. Everything is in the Box that you'll need to get Started. Please note, the Cameras that come with this System DO NOT have built in Microphones. Please see Zmodo's Amazon Site to add 1, or several Audio/Video Cameras. If Audio is something you need, they have a great selection of Cameras with Built in Microphones. I ordered this system with 2 Extra Cameras that Sport Audio as well... All Told, This system, and 2 Added Cameras with Audio and Cables ran me $308.00. I give Zmodo and this Particular Product 5 Bright Stars!

Reviews.Title: Better Than Expected.
Reviews.Author: David G.
Reviews.Content: This security system was better than expected. Did a lot of research and settled on the 8 channel 1TB Hard Drive with four Sony cameras. The picture quality is very good, color is also very good. I was more impressed with the quality of night recording. Everything I needed was in the box. Still have not set to view with mobile or over the internet. Hopefully, will do that in the near future. Anyone looking for a inexpensive and great video, this is a great system.

Reviews.Title: Good system, but missing one element
Reviews.Author: Al Pat
Reviews.Content: I got super fast shipping on this unit.  Ordered it on Thursday, and received it on Monday!!  System was easy to set up (haven't tried to get it on the network yet, but don't expect any problems) and works pretty good.  The video cables should be replaced with a better one if you want the best picture.  The cameras haven't been tried outside yet, but work well in the dark, as distances of less than 30 feet.I had one major disappointment with this unit.  The power supply only runs one camera.  If you want to use more than one camera, you have to buy an additional power supply.  WHAT??!!?!??  Yep.  There is a power supply included for one camera.  While a power supply that will run 8 cameras ins't expensive, I am a little aggravated that I now have to order another power supply before I can actually set up the system.  (AFTER LOOKING AT THE PAGE FOR THIS UNIT< I AM CONTACTING THE SELLER TO SEE WHY I DIDNT GET THE 1 to 4 SPLITTER SHOWN IN THE LISTING)This would have been an easy 4+ stars if the power supply had been included, or if at least it was mentioned in the propaganda that a additional power supply was needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice starter system for the price
Reviews.Author: Joe Blow
Reviews.Content: After reading many reviews and researching many security camera systems I decided to go with the this one.PROS:1TB hard drive and it is already installed.The dvr system is easy to set-up and  navigate through. Even the network setup was easy. They have quite a few videos on youtube to follow. Motion detection, email notifications and all that works great.Lets you record in many different settings including D1.The cameras that come with it are ok for starter cameras. The colors look good and night vision works up to about 15 feet.The Zmodo tech support is actually pretty good. I contacted them online and over the phone and they were very helpful.It is easy to add additional cameras and microphones to the system.CONS:Two of the cables broke when installing the cameras. The cables are very weak and can break easily. Also they aren't quite long enough. I recommend purchasing additional cables that are 100 feet long.The detail on the cameras that come with the system is not that great. Somebody needs to be within 10 feet of the camera in order for you to identify them. Any farther than 10 feet away and they are unrecognizable. The night vision works ok if you have exterior lighting, but if not, the night vision only works up to about 10 feet away. I purchased  a few higher quality cameras to go with these cameras. As with most security systems I think this system works better as a detourant than a way of actually capturing criminals in the act.Installing the cameras and cables can be a bear especially if you have to crawl through the attic and drill holes.The email notification could be better. It merely emails you a low resolution picture of the motion that is detected. Would be better if it actually emailed you the video.The remote viewing option requires you to make your network more vulnerable to viruses, hackers, etc. because you have to open ports and disable certain firewalls and such. I decided not to use this remote viewing option for now because I did not want to disable my firewall.Final Thoughts:For the cost you can't really beat this system. The dvr itself is worth the price and the cameras and cables are like freebies. I definitely recommend upgrading the cameras if you want good resolution and night vision that works more than 10 feet away. This Zmodo system is a nice starter system, but definitely requires some upgrading of the cameras.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected for the money paid
Reviews.Author: Damian Marynski
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on surveillance cameras before I placed my order on Amazon.  Looking over some reviews I have found that some reviews don't tell actually what they should.What to take into consideration?First you need to analyze where the cameras will be located and how many do you actually need? Yes, you can have up to 8 cameras on this Zmodo 8 CH surveillance system. If the cameras will be located near each other within the cable range then you are good, but if you will need to extend the cables make sure to buy Female to Female, Male to Female head connectors to extend the cable as they don't come with the unit.The camerasThe camera  picture at night is good enough to see the person walking. However, you won't be able to see the person's t-shirt color or pant's color, unless they get closer to the cameras. If  the cameras are placed outside and it is night time I strongly recommend adding motion activated lights from Home Depot or Lowe's, they are anywhere from $30 to $80.The cameras perform beautiful during the day. You will be able to tell clearly who is coming, or who just passed.The SystemThe system came with 1TB hard drive already on board so that is plenty for 2 full weeks of recording under 6 cameras. I have currently 6 installed and when I went on vacation for two weeks I was able to see what happened around the house. Connecting the system to the cameras is very easy and it can be done within an hour or so depends on how many cameras you plan on using.The best part is that while you are away you can take a look at the cameras from your local PC, tablet, laptop, iPhone or Android phone.  Someday recommend using an IP Cam Viewer application which can be downloaded from iTunes or Play Store. The free version only allows up to 4 cameras but I bought the pro version and that version allows up to 8 or 16 cameras.Before you buy this unit make sure to make a list of everything you will need* Female to Female connectors or Male to Female depends on your setup* Home Depot or Lowe's Lights* Adding more cameras

Reviews.Title: Good starter system with good features
Reviews.Author: Jess Hoodenpyle
Reviews.Content: I'm using this system for my home. I wanted system that had a good quality picture, that could be upgraded with more cameras,  and that I could access over the internet.  This system seems to be of decent quality.  The resolution/picture quality is decent, the night vision is ok and the operation system is easy to navigate.  I have not hooked it up to the internet yet, but that is my next chore.  Overall this system seems to be a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: This is a cool item with the best competitive price you can find online. Easy to set up and install. I have not configure the mobile viewing. I would have given it a 5 stars if the camera night vision is clear enough. But with this price, I can complain.Pros:Lots of features to configureCons:Camera night view not sufficientNo audio on camera

Reviews.Title: Great price, good quality
Reviews.Author: pool boy
Reviews.Content: Installation is simple, great capacity, works perfect at least for now, hopefully will not be any problems, especially with cameras in future, but price is right and worth to take a chance. Cameras are NOT Sony (see title: Sony CCD) just censors inside cameras, but look nice and clean, who cares who make it as long as it works. Big companies always subcontract to others. Happy with purchase

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Thomas Schiller
Reviews.Content: Video quality is not as good as I expected. Had some issues with the DVR too. Awaiting new unit at the time of the review.

Reviews.Title: great dvr! cameras are not so good. but over all a good starter system!
Reviews.Author: preybird1
Reviews.Content: Cameras lack real clarity. I could not even see a car licence plate 20 feet out! Haven't tested the infared yet. Wasn't dark when I finished. And I didn't have enough cable to get it installed inside. So tested the system on the roof with the DVR and monitor on the roof! If you can afford it get better TVL cameras like 650  or higher!

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Michael Alan
Reviews.Content: Directions/Manuel needs a lot of work. Night vision poor, but what do you expect for the price. Wire's seem a little cheap so we'll see how long they last. Overall it appears like it will do the job. Shipping was quick.

Reviews.Title: Zmodo 8Ch security system with 4 cameras
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: The user interface is good and this one did come with a 1TB hard drive which is good. The cameras do take decent day pictures but their claim of 65' night pictures is ridiculous, more like 20'. Now that I purchased it and installed, it is too late to pull it out and replace it so I will probably just upgrade the cameras. Also, their Mobil app doesn't want to connect, I used the aftermarket KMEye app and it works great. Their call center help line is the usual phone helpline person who knows nothing technical, they just go down their list of help answers.

Reviews.Title: Zmodo security camera system
Reviews.Author: Kking
Reviews.Content: This system is pretty easy to set up and get running. The cameras are adequate for smaller areas. The display on the tv is a lot better than our old system that blinked back and forth from camera to camera. This system you have a split screen where you can see all cameras at once. Since this system doesn't have audio, we took another customers advise and added another camera with audio. It's a great system for the price.

Reviews.Content: ftp is broken and email support says its not working for nowso we have to wait for a update to get an advertised featurecd has a virus on itemail notifications only work if you use ip of your email server

Reviews.Title: happy camper
Reviews.Author: gBo
Reviews.Content: I have used many usb video recorders and pci's and found out that it mostly depends on the cameras performance. You get what you pay for and these are great quality for the price. Both ends of camers are plastc abs and seem to look water tight but the only way I know how to tell is Time. The dvr was simple since it came with a tb hard drive.

Reviews.Title: Very good cameras night vision but,..
Reviews.Author: EFTHYMIOS PAPADOPOULOS
Reviews.Content: This is a good deal, the cameras, cables and dvr but after 6 months the dvr started with issues. I check the playbacks and sometimes freezes, sometimes doesn't show the scene and well, it became frustrating sometimes but, I believe it is just sometimes you hit the jackpot

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Rene
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time and good instructions the only problem was get it remotely!  Installation was hard but not complaints for it, because it works fine!

Reviews.Title: Good camera system if you don't need motion detection
Reviews.Author: Richw "Rliege"
Reviews.Content: The images captured by these cameras are pretty good, considering the price. Cameras are fairly easy to mount and set up but the connection to the DVR will stick, making them difficult to unplug if you need to swap them around. The menus take a little getting used to, not exactly intuitive, but after poking around a little it's not too bad.  I set up the device on my home network without too much difficulty and now I can connect to it over the Internet from wherever I am.The only real complaint I have is the sensitivity setting for motion detection. There are levels 1-4 with 1 being the least sensitive.  I have tinkered with these and have yet to find any rhyme or reason as to what makes them tick.  I have tried setting them on 2 and had the trees across the street trigger the camera.  Nothing else in the frame is moving and the camera will run for hours. But at night, it captures nothing. I can walk up to the camera without triggering it.  I move the sensitivity up to 3 or 4 and finally it will trigger and I can lower the sensitivity, even down to 2 or 1, and it will trigger.  Other times, still set on 2, I get days and days of video of a spider web on the camera, then it doesn't capture cars going by the front of my house.It would be nice to set the cameras so they trigger on movement so you don't have to search through hours of nothing but if you just want to set it to capture everything at specific times of the day or just let it run all the time, this is a decent device.The color is pretty good and there is a menu for color correction. At night it switches to black and white but still captures a pretty good image.  The system can be upgraded to add up to 8 cameras and a PTZ (pan, tilt zoom) camera with controls.

Reviews.Title: Awesome !  And fast delivery!
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: My first surveillance equipment !  The only problem I have is the cheap thin wires, the stapler  cut throughout the wire ,  and any pressure in the  wire will throw  the. Video  into a fuzzy screen!  I have to use plastic  holders for the. Wire!Started Great ! Next move is he internet !  Cameras are decent picture, video! Auto focus and adjustments !

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Chester
Reviews.Content: You need a computer avg cord can find one at wal marts thats the only thing u dont get with with this but it was easy to use easy to install great for the money

Reviews.Title: Complete package
Reviews.Author: Akira
Reviews.Content: Good looking product. Price point with 1tb drive and cameras is excellent. Good place to start and maybe later add better cameras for longer distances at night. Port forwarding is required for remote viewing but the website has a great walkthru customized for any system they sell as well as most home routers.Why 4 not 5? The product I received (zmd-dd-san8) required firmware update to operate properly for remote viewing. This is a simple enough process but the firmware wasn't listed as a support download but rather as a knowledge base page in a different part of the site. Requires use of fat32 USB flash drive to transfer said firmware. Only found this when troubleshooting why it wasn't working. Finding the correct android phone/iPad viewing software is also a chore, I tried three different viewers before deciphering the site. If you are looking for info or troubleshooting find your product info and search both the knowledge base on the site and support\downloads section. Just means more time on setup.Good product for the price otherwise. All required parts included. Setup of remote viewing can be fiddly. 4/5

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: James DeMichael
Reviews.Content: I do not give "Love It" very much but, this reasonable priced system performed better than I expected. The picture quality is great and would only be improved by HD cameras. Works great day or night and I highly recommend for the DIY'er. I planned my system to have 6 for exterior and 2 for interior w/ added mics. I have posted on previous reviews the need for PLANNING your build. Remember additional length cables, 3 wire cables for mics, splitter for power at box, additional cameras (int/ext/CCTV/PTZ), mics, male/male connectors, etc... Work it out on paper and you'll be happy you did.

Reviews.Title: Great so far!!
Reviews.Author: David Nooney
Reviews.Content: The unit is awesome! i've got it on the web and can use it remotely anywhere including my smart phone. I like the night vision cameras, although i wish they were a little more powerfull.

Reviews.Title: amazing security system
Reviews.Author: misael rivera
Reviews.Content: Its amazing for the low price I paid for it I'm really satisfied with the product I will strongly recommended it

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: vic
Reviews.Content: Decent picture, installed three weeks ago and still works OK, easy to install if you follow instructions from their website for networking part.If you want an inexpensive security surveillance system, it not a bad choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice Package
Reviews.Author: RICK WEBB
Reviews.Content: The four cameras work well and are mostly clear.  This unit makes it easy to add up to four more cameras if needed.  The recording works well, but in motion activated recording when the wind blows, the tree limbs move and the device starts recording.  I have this installed at a business I manage. Overall I would recommend this package.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: R.J.Camera
Reviews.Content: For the money it is very impressive, Purchased additional cameras and a battery back up to complete the system. Cameras are good at night but short range than daylight but still better than expected.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: angel gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Would buy again from seller the camera are good what I wanted and some far it's working good just need to set it up on my phnoe

Reviews.Title: Hard to troubleshoot
Reviews.Author: B.
Reviews.Content: The item came with a simple manual that not covered well all the instructions. Went online and some pages were under construction. Called and wait like 30 mins to get a person then did some troubleshoot steps and direct my call to another dpt.  lost the call and have to try for 4 consecutive days to get someone that finally helped me to get up an running. Other hand the quality of the item is good.

Reviews.Title: Home security
Reviews.Author: robert lee hayes II
Reviews.Content: Clear picture day or night. Easy set up. Bought one Extra camera fo sound. We have had this system for a month no problems

Reviews.Title: well - different from what I ordered
Reviews.Author: G. Chase "Chix Chips"
Reviews.Content: They do not give you long enough wires - the cameras are not Sony.so I had my doubts the system will not be up toour expectations.very low end product

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Do NOT Recommend this product. Check for Viruses FIRST.
Reviews.Author: C. Young
Reviews.Content: The software came infected with the Sality32 Trojan / Virus.  The software on the web site was also infected.  The online wait time was over an hour.  The online help files were Wrong about how to set up a router.  In order to connect cameras to my computer, I would have opened up my entire network to the virus.  The cameras also had too much Glow all the time.  In short, the company obviously do NOT know what their customers in America need or want.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Rafael Garcia
Reviews.Content: Was able to connect system. Fairly easy to install. Had some trouble with internet viewing and mobile device, instructions were helpful, but the manual text was so small had to use a magnifying glass to read. Instructions could be a little more detailed, like what port number to use. Cameras images not of high quality. I'm still playing with it and would probably give a better review once completed.

Reviews.Title: Dead after 3 months
Reviews.Author: Big Daddy
Reviews.Content: The unit suddenly died after 3 months.  As I write this, I have tried three methods to contact the company:  I have been on hold for 30 minutes with Zmodo by phone; the live chat option (with customer service) timed out after 10 minutes- forcing me to leave a message; and the live chat support with tech support has had me queued for over an hour (I may leave the window open overnight to see if anyone ever checks it.So far customer service is probably the worst I've experienced- if I finally hear back from the company I may update this review.Update:  Okay, so after much searching, calling, email. etc I finally got through to a human being at customer service. (Took about 5 days).  After speaking to a technician, I got a repair number and was able to fill out an RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) to send the unit back for repair.  After a trip to the post office and $26 dollars later- off the unit went.  I got it back today (about a week later), made all the connections, reset the password, and got video from all of my cameras- for about 2 minutes.  Then the screen garbled again and went dead.  Great.  I e-mailed customer service and asked for some resolution to this issue- will post again depending on what I hear.Update:  Finally got a new unit after all the run-around.  It's been a couple of weeks, and seems to be working ok, so I put a couple of stars back- let's see how it does in the coming months...

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Karen Messina
Reviews.Content: Works great! the picture is clear and night vision works great!  we love it.  Somewhat easy installation as well. We just needed one cord that was not in the package.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Ali Hojeij "Ali Hojeij"
Reviews.Content: clear picture, easy installation, recommended big time for people looking for home security. monitoring your home remotely is just great
